column1: Petitioner  to  the  present  application  G.K.  Udeni  Janaka  Perera  had  come  before  this  court  seeking

column2: A writ of Certiorari quashing the  Environmental  Protection  License  (here  in  after  referred  to
as EPL) issued to  the  4th Respondent dated 28.01.2015.
A  writ  of Mandamus  directing  the  5th  Respondent  or  anyone  or  more  Respondents  to  take
steps according to  law against the operation of the said garage at  the above captioned premises
